name: Dream (itch) (EmilyDream)
description: his is a story driven 3D adventure game. The game is developed on PC platform. Players will control a character who can enter other people's dreams and play the game from the perspective of the third person. In the game, the protagonist can move, interact with various props in the scene, and get clues through dialogue with others, save a classmate with childhood shadow through communication, and finally guide him out of the dilemma and self acceptance.
